products.name: H01 - Hand Moisturiser Niacinamide 5% + Lactic Acid 1%
products.description: Calm, soften, and hydrate dry hands using this highly moisturising, airy, and non-greasy formula. Incorporating a mix of active ingredients at strength, ensuring superior and deep hydration, leaving your hands feeling soft and flexible.
products.details: For all seasons - Delivers refreshing moisture to dryness.
products.instructions: Apply small amount of hand cream on palm and rub hands together thoroughly until dry. Reapply as required.

products.name: H01 - Hand Moisturiser Trio Bundle
products.description: Trio bundle of H01 Hand Moisturiser to deliver superior and deeply penetrating hydration, leaving your hands feeling soft and flexible.
products.details: Suitable for general skin types. For all seasons - Delivers refreshing moisture to dryness.
products.instructions: Apply small amount of hand cream on palm and rub hands together thoroughly until dry. Reapply as required.
